ResourceHeader.Description: The NVK-ONCH instrument is a part of the complex of closely-related wave experiments on Interball 2. The others are MEMO, POLRAD, and IESP. The NVK-ONCH instrument measures VLF electromagnetic waves in the frequency range 20 Hz - 20 KHz.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the VLF Electromagnetic Waves (NVK-ONCH) experiment on the Interball Auroral Probe mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: VLF Electromagnetic Waves (NVK-ONCH) on Interball Auroral Probe
